titles.title: SAFE Sunscreen Standards Act
SAFE Sunscreen Standards Act
Supporting Accessible, Flexible, and Effective Sunscreen Standards

A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to improve the regulatory review process to determine the safety and effectiveness of nonprescription drugs intended for topical administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
